A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall it was solid. I could have done without the slapstick humor\, Finn's side story\, and a couple scenes with some frog nuns that made me question my own sobriety. There's also a very fine line for a director to walk when punctuating dramatic moments with comedy; sometimes it works in the Last Jedi and sometimes it doesn't. All of this is more than made up for with a relatively compelling story for the main protagonist/antagonist\, a couple of interesting twists near the end\, and the most badass light saber battle in a Star Wars film to date.
